page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: In the twelve squares that we have been given, lies the village of {Aberdour}and in the South West corner of our area a little part of{Dalgety {Bay,}the village we stay in. {Aberdour}is a seaside village and the population is approximately {2,500}.Although the population is small it is a main attraction for tourists because of the beach.The beach is called{"Silversands."}There is also a harbour and even though it is small it has it's own yachting club. In the summer there are boat trips from the beach to{Inchcolm {Island.}There are about two dozen factories on the{Hillend Industrial {Estate}.Most of them are Electronic factories.The factories are built on an old airfield .Just a couple of people in{Dalgety Bay School}are in range of the(cont.)
